name: Akihiko Yoshida (Bravely Default, FF Tactics, NieR) Style LoRA
description:
Akihiko Yoshida style LoRA

Official illustrator for Bravely Default, Final Fantasy Tactics and NieR series

Making models can be expensive. Do you like what I do? Consider supporting me on Patreon 🅿️ or feel free to buy me a coffee ☕

Elinerd on Discord asked me to do this one. I like this illustrator a lot, but I was a bit afraid because of the lack of good labeled data available. However I think it turned out good. I used AnythingElse and AnyLoRA for those examples but I guess that most of the neutral anime mix will work decently. I suggest weight 1 for the offset version (0.6 for the old one).

Because the dataset was small and had many repetitions this LoRA also picked up some of the characters, but it's mainly a style LoRA.

How to use LoRA's in auto1111:

  • Update webui (use git pull like here or redownload it)

  • Copy the file to stable-diffusion-webui/models/lora

  • Select your LoRA like in this video

  • Make sure to change the weight (by default it's :1 which is usually too high)
